Screenwriter: Jake Goldberger, Dan Wetzel, David Scott
Production Co: Animus Films, Steakhaus Productions, Serena Films
Rating: PG-13 (Some Drug Content|Brief Violent Images|All Involving Teens|Thematic Elements)
Synopsis: Determined to help at-risk youths avoid the mistakes he made, an ex-con (Cuba Gooding Jr.) forms a chess club to offer them an alternative to running with street gangs.
Title: Life of a King
